name: CLONED - A Short FPS Game
description:
Hello and thanks for checking out my game! This is the first game I have ever made so there are a few bugs in it. Any feedback is much appreciated.  

-The game was made using blueprints in Unreal Engine 4

-All 3D Models and animations were made by myself in Blender 3D

-Sounds were generated using bfxr and some were from freesound.org (CC0)

-All the music was from freesound.org (CC0)                                                                                                                                                

Game description: You were captured and cloned into 3 different types of enemies that want to kill you. Your objective is to get to the exit of each of the 3 levels in total without dying. The levels get progressively more difficult, with a new clone introduced each level. However you are not alone with just the cloned enemies.....

Controls:

Walk Forwards: W Key

Walk Backwards: S Key

Walk Left: A Key

Walk Right: D Key

Sprint: Left Shift Key

Crouch: C Key

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Aim: Right Mouse Button

Reload: R Key

Pause: Escaoe Key
